title: The Courage of one's convictions
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
description: Episode of Series "A Discussion in bioethics". One of a series of short, open-ended dramas designed to stimulate discussion of values and ethics in relation to modern technology. Because of her religious convictions, a seventeen-year-old girl refuses medical treatment that will prolong her life. Her decision remains firm in spite of the pleas of her physician, who begins to question who has the right to determine a person's life or death.
related_objects: Series; S01407; A Discussion in bioethics; Active; 1986
